title: Is it still possible to change your login screen video and music?
body:
Recently looked online to see if you could change the video and music that plays on your login screen and as far as I can tell it was possible about 2+ years back but there are no new recent guides and all old guides want you to go to the file lol_air_client but this file isn't there anymore, was it just renamed to something else or is it just not possible to change this anymore? Would love feedback

-Thanks, Grant

replies.body: If you want to make this beta client even more unstable then it is possible. Since you can boot the client offline it still has a background and sound. Meaning they still have editable files
Yes your right, just not sure where to find them...
If you're crazy just copy all the game files and fidget with the copy. See what works and see what doesn't. I don't know how to help here but I'm sure you or someone else can find it with time
I don't believe it's possible to manually change the login splash screen on the current client, but it's something that could always come back.
pls, I want to have the Arcade Ahri login on my client
